refresher.title: Project Goal
refresher.content:
# Mini Project

Build a **Task Tracker App**

Features:
- Add task
- Mark complete
- Delete task

---

This project combines multiple React concepts.

concept.title: Concepts You Will Use
concept.content:
- Components
- useState
- Events
- Lists & keys
- Conditional rendering
- Controlled inputs

concept2.title: Project Structure
concept2.content:
```
src/
 ├─ components/
 │   ├─ TaskForm.jsx
 │   ├─ TaskItem.jsx
 │   └─ TaskList.jsx
 ├─ App.jsx
 └─ main.jsx
```

syntax.title: Task Data Shape
syntax.content:
```
{
  id: number,
  text: string,
  completed: boolean
}
```
